content.version:
home web server
having a web server is really cool. all your files are accessible from anyplace with an internet connection, and you are in full control (excepting of course the IP restrictions)
home server web site forum ideas pages wiki project pages (links with master list) comparison pages page editor raw basic user (no tags allowed, etc.) folder selection multi-column file selection screen protection/user-specific permissions main page content main page layout/design sidebar/top/bottom content (personalized?) login/accounts user-added content uploader running python scripts? bookmarks page

home web server
having a web server is really cool. all your files are accessible from anyplace with an internet connection, and you are in full control (excepting of course the ISP restrictions)
